data.title: Attract group mobile app development portfolio
data.meta_description: Attract group mobile app development portfolio  - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. Full-Cycle Development Different Areas of Expertise Optimized Workflow Attract Group is team of IT experts specialised in web & mobile technologies. Our mission is to accelerate global business digitalization and help new businesses emerge faster. Our goal is to transform outdated world businesses into digital and help them adapt to the new world and optimize their inefficient processes. We have been successfully operating in the global market of IT service providers since 2011 and have gained 5* reviews from our clients on independant review and rating platforms like Clutch, Goodfirms, etc. BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH ATTRACT GROUP Business Centricity Continious Project Evolvement Long-term Partnership ABOUT US

3. IN ONE STOP! Attract group is a trusted technological partner. We provide full-cycle development services for web & mobile products of any complexity. If in doubt, our R&D team will research possible solutions for your case and get back to you with a complete analysis report and preferred recommendations prior to the implementation phase. GET ALL SERVICES Web Development Native Android & IOS Development + Crossplatform QA services & Test Automation UI/UX Design DevOps, CI/CD Third-Party integrations IT Consulting Project technical documentation Mockups or clickable prototypes Project monitoring & alerting setup A complete cycle of services for your business to take off. OUR SERVICES

5. CLIENT’S GEOGRAPHY Spain Barcelona Ukraine Kyiv Odessa United Kingdom London Denmark Region Zealand Russia Moscow Kazan’ Netherlands Amsterdam Austria Vienna Taiwan Taipei USA Chicago, IL Washington D.C. Los Angeles, CA Raleigh, NC Plainfield, IL Seattle, WA Fiji

6. E-Commerce/Retail Uber-type Food Industry Education Property Management Agriculture HRM/Recruitment Event Platform Advertisement Industries we have Developed Mobile Apps For Uber-type E-Commerce/Retail KEY AREAS OF OUR EXPERTISE

8. WEB ANDROID IOS JANDH.com Links: E-Commerce / Retail JANDH FISHING TACKLE Project overview An e-commerce fishing tackle store. The Project has turned into a professional fishing e-commerce platform within 5 years of cooperation. The customer received a complete automated logistics pipeline to speed up the sales process.

9. WEB ANDROID IOS my.kopeyka.com.ua Links: E-COMMERCE & RETAIL KOPIIKA SUPERMARKET CHAIN Project overview A digital web- and mobile-based loyalty program for retail with a personal account for the KopiikaTM grocery chain customers. It ensures seamless access to the customer’s information (purchase history, bonuses, promotions) and improves the shopping experience. Admins can create special offers for loyal customers to promote their company. Buyers can see special offers and bonuses in their accounts. Customers can find the nearest stores and plot the routes to them.

10. ANDROID IOS Demo Links: On-demand services Uber-type Apps Project overview A ready-made web & mobile solution for on-demand uber-type shipment businesses. It consists of 2 apps: a customer and a driver (for both iOS and Android platforms), and a backend admin management panel, plus a landing page. Real-time order creation and Geolocation search and driver assignment. Automatic calculation of the final fare based on distance, size of the delivery, etc. GPS Tracking enables both a customer and an admin to track the driver’s location during the order performance while.

11. WEB ANDROID IOS TOMATO.UA FOOD INDUSTRY TOMATO Project overview A portal that allows finding the best restaurants, cafes, and bars in Ukraine. Users can filter restaurants, make table reservations and manage them in the personal accounts. Visitors can bookmark restaurants, add photos, and write reviews about their favorite places. Restaurant managers can create special offers, and promote them. WEB ANDROID IOS TOMATO.UA Links: FOOD INDUSTRY TOMATO Project overview A portal that allows finding the best restaurants, cafes, and bars in Ukraine. Users can filter restaurants, make table reservations and manage them in the personal accounts. Visitors can bookmark restaurants, add photos, and write reviews about their favorite places. Restaurant managers can create special offers, and promote them.

12. Links: WEB ANDROID IOS GOAMENITY.COM Property Management ELEVATE Project overview An application & a website for managing spaces, rentals and services created for commercial, corporate & multi-family managers & operators to provide a one-stop shop for all amenities and communication with their communities. Real estate owners can add their building into the platform and assign offices to rental companies. Users can reserve on-site services like conference rooms and have access to all the onsite amenities. App users get notified and alerted about important news and events.

13. ANDROID IOS myhardi.com Links: AGRICULTURE myhardi Project overview An app created to provide information, videos/tutorials, and manuals/instructions for the MyHARDI Agricultural Spraying equipment. TWIN Savings is a calculator to determine chemicals savings and spray capacity for the sprayers. Nozzle selector is a custom filter with calculations that lets purchasers pick the right nozzle. Contact dealer module visualizes the MyHARDI’s global points of sale on the map.

14. ANDROID IOS Links: HRM / Recruitment Headhunter Project overview Headhunter is a video-based job search network to find the best job faster while showing your personality and character. A Tinder-like video profile allows job seekers to upload videos about their experience and employers to give job details. Bookmarks and connections enable users to save profiles and ask them for a connection. Privacy of contacts, addresses, and last names are available only in case of mutual connection.

15. Links: IOS ssceneapp.com Event Platform Sscene Project overview An app for selling tickets and bottle services for different club events. Convenient and secure ticket sales process. Split the Bill functionality allows the group of friends to share the costs of the order. Ticket Sharing feature lets the ticket owner share the purchased tickets with their friends. Sscene Management app enables security guards to check/scan the tickets of the guests.

16. Haven’t found the required technology? Ask us if we work with it already. BACKEND PHP/ Laravel, Python/ Django, Mysql, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS DynamoDB, ElasticSearch, Sphinx, socket.io, AWS SQS, AWS Media Live, AWS Media Package FrontEND JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Vue.js and Nuxt, Ionic, Angular 2+, React, React Native, Flutter Bootstrap, Element Ui, AMP, Gulp, Webpack, PWA Integrations RabbitMQ, FireBase, Social, Twitter, Facebook, ClickSend, Twilio, Google Maps, Apple Maps, Slack, Quickbooks, MailChimp, Bitrix mobile/ios iOS, macOS, Swift (RxSwift), Objective-C, MVVM, Clean Swift, RxCocoa, Cocoa Pods, File Provider, HapticTouch, CoreData, Realm Mobile/Android Kotlin (RxKotlin), Java, MVVM, MVP, SQLlite, Realm, FaceID, TouchID, Pushnotifications, RxJava, RxKotlin, Koin, OkHttp, DataBinding, Flutter Payment Systems Stripe, Apple Pay, Paypal, Braintree, Google Pay, Mobile In-App-Purchases UI/UX Design Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, PremierePro, Sketch, Principle, Axure Hosting / CDN AWS Lambda, AWS EC2, AWS S3, Digital Ocean, Hetzner, AWS CloudFront, CloudFlare DevOps / SysOps Nginx, Docker, Vault, Ansible, Docker Swarm, AWS Route53
